price: ߒ߬ߞߊ߬ ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߋߟߊ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ( ߡߍ߲ߞߍ߭ ) ߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߘߢߊ߬ ߜߍߟߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߥߊߡߌ߫
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
